item.title: CVE-2022-4169|2024-08-03T01:34:49.301Z -- marcinkazmierski -- theme%20and%20plugin%20translation%20for%20polylang%20%28ttfp%29
item.description: The Theme and plugin translation for Polylang is vulnerable to authorization bypass in versions up to, and including, 3.2.16 due to missing capability checks in the process_polylang_theme_translation_wp_loaded() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update plugin and theme translation settings and to import translation strings.
